Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villager', 3: 'The heroes are here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia, Lee, and Kamui were surrounded by armed villagers before they even entered the village.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villager', 3: 'Freeze, you bloody "heroes"!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think we are supposed to be the heroes you are talking about. But why the hostility...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villager', 3: 'Stop bluffing. Your friends—the other group of "heroes"—just seized all the recovery potions of another village nearby! They claimed to have the King\'s order!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wow, so this is the type of game where we can't just take anything we want...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's the last thing you should be surprised about.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The villagers became even more emotional as they talked. The other group of heroes must have done a lot of horrible things.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Lucia, I think they are probably referring to Vera's team.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah, I guess so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I can't rule out the possibility that Liv was there, but based on the response of these villagers, only Vera would do such thing...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I must apologize for what they did. But we are different from them. Please let me explain...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villager', 3: 'Enough said! The other village was attacked right when they were listening to the "explanation"!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia wanted to explain, but the already prepared villagers started attacking regardless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't worry, this happens a lot in games. Just control your power and beat them up!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You are only smart in games, Kamui.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hehe, thanks!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That wasn't meant to be a compliment...", 4: '2'}
